XXahovk1_u:2_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye buddho bhagavāñ chrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham anekair devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaiḥ sthavirabhikṣuvītarāgasaṃghair bodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca śrāvakair daśabhir lokapālaiś caturmahārājakāyikair anekaiś caturvarṇakair manuṣyair anekaśatasahasraiḥ parivāraiḥ parivṛtaiḥ /
XXahovk1_u:2_1: tasmin sabhāmaṇḍale sarve dharmaśravaṇikā lokā bhagavantam abhivīkṣya caityavratakathām anudhyāyantaḥ samāsthitāḥ /
XXahovk1_u:2_2: atha khalu subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ svāsanāt samutthāyaikāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya savyajānubimbaṃ bhuvi sthāpya bhagavantaṃ praṇamyaitad avocat /
XXahovk1_u:avk_2_1: tadvidhiṃ ca kathaṃ brūhi tat sarvaṃ jagatāṃ prabho //
XXahovk1_u:avk_3_0: sādhu sādhu subhūte tvaṃ śṛṇu sattvānukampaka /
XXahovk1_u:avk_6_0: śrotum icchāmi tat sarvaṃ yad vratānāṃ samuttamam /
XXahovk1_u:avk_8_0: śṛṇu rājan mayā khyātaṃ vratānāṃ vratam uttamam /
XXahovk1_u:avk_9_1: caityaṃ saṃpūjayec chuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśair vidhibhis tathā //
XXahovk1_u:avk_11_0: snānaṃ kṛtvā ca tīrtheṣu śucivastrāvṛtaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_11_1: madhyāhne pūjayec caityaṃ pradīpaṃ ca pradāpayet //
XXahovk1_u:avk_12_0: sūrye ṣaṣṭhagate bhāge prāśayec ca kṣīrodanam /
XXahovk1_u:avk_12_1: punar śaucādikaṃ kṛtvā dharmaṃ ca śruṇuyān mudā //
XXahovk1_u:avk_13_0: pratyūṣe pūrṇamāsyāṃ tu snātvā vrataṃ samārabhet /
XXahovk1_u:avk_15_0: catvāraś ca dhvajāḥ sthāpyā vitānaṃ saha cāmaraiḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_15_1: digmālā vividhaiḥ puṣpair lambayec ca jinālaye //
XXahovk1_u:avk_16_0: tadanu vratam ārabhya guruṃ vajradharaṃ namet /
XXahovk1_u:avk_22_1: evaṃ svahṛdi saṃbhāvya puraḥ sthāpya prapūjayet //
XXahovk1_u:avk_24_0: sāṃyojikaiḥ sugandhaiś ca sudhūpair dhūpanais tathā /
XXahovk1_u:avk_27_1: dhāraṇīṃ caiva stotraṃ ca paṭhed gītaṃ ca gāyayet //
XXahovk1_u:avk_28_1: rātriṃ divā susaṃpūrṇaṃ pracarec ca pradakṣiṇām //
XXahovk1_u:5_0: yatra devālaye tīrthe sarvān devān prapūjayet /
XXahovk1_u:avk_30_1: asparśe 'pi caret snānaṃ trisaṃdhyaṃ saṃcared vratī //
XXahovk1_u:avk_30__0: nidrāsevitaṃ nidrāṃ kṛtvā viśrāmasevitaṃ viśrāmaṃ kṛtvā rājan
XXahovk1_u:avk_30__1: tathā vrataṃ kārayed doṣakam 'sti tasmān na kārayet //}
XXahovk1_u:avk_31_0: ahorātraṃ susaṃpūrṇaṃ na nidrāṃ kārayed vratī /
XXahovk1_u:avk_33_0: viśrāmaṃ vā na kuryāc ca khedaṃ vā vratamānasaḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_33_1: ahorātre susaṃpūrṇe prātaḥ snātvā vrataṃ caret //
XXahovk1_u:avk_34_1: annaṃ vastraṃ suvarṇaṃ ca vrīhiratnāni bhūṣitān //
XXahovk1_u:avk_35_1: yajñaṃ kuryāt tato vajrī vrataṃ pūrṇaṃ prapūrayet //
XXahovk1_u:avk_36_0: abhiṣekaṃ tato dattvā pañcasūtraṃ ghaṭaṃ tathā /
XXahovk1_u:avk_38_0: gaṇacakraṃ tataḥ kuryād vidhijñas tadvidhiṃ yathā /
XXahovk1_u:avk_38_1: ity evaṃ vratarājaṃ tad yaḥ kuryāc chuddhamānasaḥ //
XXahovk1_u:avk_40_0: bhagavan sarvavin nātha punar vaktuṃ tvam arhasi /
XXahovk1_u:avk_40_1: saṃsāre bahudhā jātis teṣāṃ pracāraṇaṃ katham //
XXahovk1_u:avk_41_0: vratapūjāphalaṃ sarvaṃ kālaṃ ca samayaṃ dinam /
XXahovk1_u:avk_41_1: kutra sthāne vrataṃ kāryaṃ tat sarvaṃ vada sāṃpratam //
XXahovk1_u:avk_42_0: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga saṃkṣepād gaditaṃ mayā /
XXahovk1_u:avk_44_0: suvarṇena kṛte vāpi ratnaiś cānyaiś ca dhātubhiḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_47_0: arghaṃ dadyād raveḥ pūrvaṃ puṣpaṃ kṣipet salājakam /
XXahovk1_u:avk_49_0: oṃ āḥ hūm iti mantreṇa diśobandhaṃ satarjitam /
XXahovk1_u:avk_49_1: aṅganyāsaṃ karanyāsaṃ kṛtvā guruṃ ca vandayet //
XXahovk1_u:avk_52_0: āvāhayāmi tvaṃ nātha tiṣṭha tatra manohare /
XXahovk1_u:avk_52_1: sthiro bhava sadā mā gāḥ sāṃnidhyaṃ kuru sthāvare //
XXahovk1_u:avk_53_1: śaṅkhasthaṃ pratigṛhṇātu arghaṃ dattaṃ mayā mudā //
XXahovk1_u:avk_59_0: annaṃ caturvidhaṃ nātha rasānāṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ tathā /
XXahovk1_u:avk_59_1: ghṛtādyān śarkarāhārān bhuñjatāṃ ca sukhaṃ mama //
XXahovk1_u:avk_64_0: dhīmān pujāṃ tathā kṛtva stotram evaṃ ca kārayet /
XXahovk1_u:avk_67_0: jinajaṃ sakalasthaṃ ca puṇyakṣetraṃ namāmy aham /
XXahovk1_u:avk_69_1: dadyāt tebhyo baliṃ tuṣṭyā pūjābhaktyarcanair ataḥ //
XXahovk1_u:avk_70_1: ācāryaḥ svastivākyaiś ca kārayec ca mahotsavam //
XXahovk1_u:avk_72_0: yaḥ prakuryād vrataṃ tasmin vipulaṃ bhogam āpnuyāt /
XXahovk1_u:avk_73_0: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga vakṣye pūjāphalaṃ punaḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_73_1: yena saṃsthāpitaṃ caityaṃ vītaśoko bhaved asau /
XXahovk1_u:avk_75_0: ye dhūpayanti kṣaṇam atra lokāḥ śokā na teṣāṃ prabhavanti jātu /
XXahovk1_u:avk_76_0: sugandham asmā upaḍhaukayanti prasannacittā manujā ajasram /
XXahovk1_u:avk_77_0: ye kuṅkumādyai racitaṃ suvastraṃ dadanti ye caityatathāgatebhyaḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_77_1: śītārtiduḥkhaṃ na hi jātu teṣāṃ taddhetutaḥ koṣaviśālasāram //
XXahovk1_u:avk_79_0: śraddhāratā ye manujā udārair mālāsugandhair bahupuṣpayuktaiḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_79_1: caranti pūjāṃ bahubhaktitas te samastasaukhyāni labhanti loke //
XXahovk1_u:avk_81_0: naivedyam asmai pradadāti loke yo bhaktiyuktaḥ surasaṃ sugandhim /
XXahovk1_u:avk_82_1: yatheṣṭaṃ phalam āpnoti nirogī sukhavān sadā //
XXahovk1_u:avk_83_1: rājyaṃ hi yad vigatakaṇṭakam āpnuvanti bhaiṣajyadānavidhinā tad uśanti caitye //
XXahovk1_u:avk_85_0: vitānam uccair vitanoti caitye dhanyas triloke paripūjanīyaḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_86_0: dhvajān patākān abhiropayanti ye caityabimbe khalu bhaktiyuktāḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_86_1: mahīśvarās te jitaduṣṭasaṃghā bhavanti nāthā divi bhūtale ca //
XXahovk1_u:avk_87_0: chattrāṇi nānāmaṇibhir mahārhaiḥ saṃpādayanty āttamanā dadanti /
XXahovk1_u:avk_88_1: saṃghoṣaṇāṃ ye vitaranti caitye te 'bhijñayā pañcabhir āśrayante //
XXahovk1_u:avk_89_1: nṛtyaṃ ca kārayen nityaṃ kuryāc ca divyaghoṣaṇām //
XXahovk1_u:avk_90_0: te narāḥ susvarā bhonti sundarā divi bhūtale /
XXahovk1_u:avk_91_1: vandyamānāḥ sugotrāś ca niṣpāpāś ca bahuśrutāḥ //
XXahovk1_u:avk_94_1: bhāgyavanto dhanāḍhyāś ca gacchanty ante jinālayam //
XXahovk1_u:avk_97_1: vinaṣṭaśokāḥ subhagāḥ suvaṃśāḥ pūrṇendriyāḥ pūrṇamanorathāḥ syuḥ //
XXahovk1_u:avk_98_0: ye śuddhacittāḥ stutim ācaranti gadyātmikāṃ padyamayīṃ vicitrām /
XXahovk1_u:avk_98_1: te śabdasaṃghān bahuvādyajātān śṛṇvanti gītān surabhāminīnām //
XXahovk1_u:avk_99_0: yāvatī bhūmir ākrāntā hy adhaḥ kāñcanacakrataḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_101_0: ye jātamātrāḥ prabhutāṃ prayānti śreṣṭhīkule janma sadaiva yeṣām /
XXahovk1_u:avk_101_1: hastyaśvayānaiś ca paribhramanti kṛtvātra te caityavarapraṇāmam //
XXahovk1_u:avk_102_0: akāra-m-ādyakṣaramantrarājair balyūpahāraṃ khalu yo hi dadyāt /
XXahovk1_u:avk_102_1: tasmai sudevāḥ sagaṇāḥ sutṛptā dāsyanti satkarmaphalābhilāṣam //
XXahovk1_u:avk_103_1: dhaneśvarā dīrghatarāyuṣas te narāmarāṇāṃ subhagā bhavanti //
XXahovk1_u:avk_104_0: ye buddham uddiśya mahānti nityaṃ kurvanti mṛdgomayalepanāni /
XXahovk1_u:avk_104_1: bhaktyā suśuddhā jalamaṇḍalaṃ vā labhanti te rājabalaṃ subhāgyāḥ //
XXahovk1_u:avk_105_0: stūpāṅgaṇaṃ dhātuvaraṃ vihāraṃ ye śodhayantīha narāḥ prayatnaiḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_105_1: nirmālyam ebhyaś ca samuddharanti te hemavarṇāḥ sudṛśo bhavanti //
XXahovk1_u:10_0: pradakṣiṇāṃ ye vitaranti tasmin bhavanti jātismaralābhinas te /
XXahovk1_u:avk_114_0: carmakāraś ca mātaṅgo niyogī rajako dhvajī /
XXahovk1_u:avk_114_1: etaiś ca dūrataḥ sthitvā vandanīyo jinālayaḥ //
XXahovk1_u:avk_115_1: anyaiś ca vividhair nityaṃ pūjyo mānyo jinālayaḥ //
XXahovk1_u:avk_117_0: evaṃ bhūyaś cared dharmī vratarājam aharniśam /
XXahovk1_u:avk_117_1: tasya puṇyaṃ yathā proktaṃ kuṣṭhavyādhikṣayaṃ vrajet //
XXahovk1_u:avk_119_0: na hī sa vidyate rājan sarvatra bhuvaneṣv api /
XXahovk1_u:avk_120_0: śravād api haret pāpaṃ darśanāt puṇyam āpnuyāt /
XXahovk1_u:avk_120_1: anumodāt tathā caivaṃ vratināṃ tu kim ucyate //
XXahovk1_u:avk_121_1: ekabhāgaṃ labhed rājā caikaṃ tu sārathījanaḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_121_2: sarvasattvasya caikaṃ hi tac cheṣaṃ labhate vratī //
XXahovk1_u:avk_122_0: iti śrutvā guror vākyam indrapṛṣṭo mahāprabhuḥ //
XXahovk1_u:avk_123_2: saṃghabhojyaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā yayau svargaṃ janaiḥ sudhīḥ //
XXahovk1_u:avk_124_0: bhagavan muniśārdūla punar vaktuṃ tvam arhasi /
XXahovk1_u:avk_124_1: kena kena purā nātha vratarājam idaṃ kṛtam //
XXahovk1_u:avk_126_0: pātāle ca purā vīro daityendro balavān abhūt /
XXahovk1_u:avk_129_0: pātāleṣu punar gatvā so 'carat tad vratottamam /
XXahovk1_u:avk_129_1: nāginyo nāgarājāś ca pātāleṣv acaraṃs tathā //
XXahovk1_u:avk_133_0: tatas taiḥ śāpitā evaṃ nāginyaḥ śambukāḥ khalu /
XXahovk1_u:avk_134_0: tataś cānte punaḥ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ puṇyabhāvataḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_134_1: eṣā sā nāyakā yā tu dharmadakṣaṃ patiṃ labhet //
XXahovk1_u:avk_135_0: tatas ta vañcitāḥ sarvāḥ śambukā dharmamānasāḥ /
XXahovk1_u:avk_136_1: bhūtā rājasutā dhanyāḥ prālabhan paramaṃ padam //
XXahovk1_u:avk_139_0: ity evaṃ bhikṣavo jñātvā vratānāṃ vratam uttamam /
XXahovk1_u:avk_140_1: tasmāc caityaḥ sadā vandyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ //
